Flow.description: Installation Return to Inventory Check-in Wizard
Flow.label: Installation Return Check-In Wizard

fields.name: Add_Failed_Output
fields.fieldText:
**** Add Failed ****
Repair_Ticket_Id: {!Repair_Ticket_Id}
Case_Id: {!Case_Id}
Account_Id: {!Account_ID}
Case_Number: {!Case_Number}
VDU_SN: {!VDU_SN}
VDU_ID: {!VDU_ID}
Repair Ticket Name: {!Create_Repair_Ticket_Name}
{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Input_Case_Number
fields.fieldText: Enter Install Case #:

fields.name: Repair_Ticket_Caption
fields.fieldText: Ready to Create Repair Ticket for VDU #{!Units_Processed_Count} of {!Case_Units_Received}

fields.name: Repair_Ticket_CaseNumber_and_Name
fields.fieldText: RMA # {!Case_Number}: {!Account_Name}

fields.name: Repair_Ticket_VDU_Model_SN
fields.fieldText: {!VDU_Model}: {!VDU_SN}

fields.name: Repair_Ticket_Category
fields.fieldText:
Repair Category: {!Repair_Category}
Out of Scope Status: {!Repair_OoS_Status}

fields.name: Print_Label
fields.fieldText: Print Temporary Serial Number Label

fields.name: RMA_Summary_Header
fields.fieldText: RMA Summary

fields.name: Case_Number_Account
fields.fieldText: Installation Case #{!Case_Number} - {!Account_Name}

fields.name: System_Type
fields.fieldText:
-------------------------------------------------------
Credit Hold: {!Account_CreditHold}
-------------------------------------------------------
System Type: {!Case_System_Type} - {!Account_VDUType}
-------------------------------------------------------

fields.name: MDU_VDU_Type
fields.fieldText: VDU Type: {!Account_MDUType}

fields.name: RMA_Units_Shipped
fields.fieldText: (# Returned Units Shipped: {!Case_Units_Shipped})

fields.name: RMA_Units_Expected_Text
fields.fieldText: # Returned Units Expected: {!Case_Units_Expected}

fields.name: Input_Units_Received
fields.fieldText: # VDUs Received:

fields.name: RMA_Status_Text
fields.fieldText:
Reason: {!Case_Reason}
Status: {!Case_Status}

fields.name: RMA_Detail_Text
fields.fieldText:
Subject: {!Case_Subject}
{!Case_Description}

fields.name: RMA_Complete_Caption
fields.fieldText: Check-In Complete!

fields.name: RMA_Complete_Counter
fields.fieldText: {!Case_Units_Received} VDUs Checked In for {!Account_Name} RMA #{!Case_Number}

fields.name: Blank_Line_6
Parts_Request_Quantity
fields.fieldText: Parts Request Quantity

fields.name: RMA_Complete_Number
fields.fieldText: Click Next to create Parts Request Task...

fields.name: RMA_Not_Found_Text
fields.fieldText: RMA NOT Found! Boo Hoo...
